data.actual_result: Switching channels will exit Edit mode but without clearing the textbox, letting you the ability to send a copy of your message in the other channel you switched to
data.expected_result: It should either exit the Edit mode and therefore clear the textbox (exactly like if you pressed the Cancel button when editing the message) , or it should take you off the ability to switch between channels
data.short_description: When editing a message, you can send a copy of it in another channel instead
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have the "Store unsent text per channel" option **disabled** in your settings - Go to a server where you have `SEND_MESSAGES` permission on at least 2 channels - Pick one of those channels, write a message and send it - Long press the message and press `Edit` - While you're still in Edit mode, switch to another channel where you can send messages
